title: Roborock Prime Day: Save big on upgraded Qrevo and Q Series robot vacuum-mops for a cool, clean summer
description: Summer is here, and the last thing anyone wants is to think about cleaning floors in the sweltering heat. Fortunately, Roborock robot vacuum and mop solutions are coming to the rescue with groundbreaking innovation and incredible value. Now is the perfect time to plan your next robot cleaner purchase, as the Roborock Prime Day launch is upon us, bringing discounts as significant as $800 off on these top-tier devices. Whether you’re battling pet hair, daily dust, or stubborn spills, Roborock’s latest lineup offers an intelligent, effortless cleaning solution for every home and budget. Let’s explore four standout models poised to make waves during this exclusive sales event. more…
author: Sponsored Post
excerpt: Summer is here, and the last thing anyone wants is to think about cleaning floors in the sweltering heat. Fortunately,...
text: Summer is here, and the last thing anyone wants is to think about cleaning floors in the sweltering heat. Fortunately, Roborock robot vacuum and mop solutions are coming to the rescue with groundbreaking innovation and incredible value. Now is the perfect time to plan your next robot cleaner purchase, as the Roborock Prime Day launch is upon us, bringing discounts as significant as $800 off on these top-tier devices. Whether you’re battling pet hair, daily dust, or stubborn spills, Roborock’s latest lineup offers an intelligent, effortless cleaning solution for every home and budget. Let’s explore four standout models poised to make waves during this exclusive sales event. Table of contentsQ7 M5+ | entry-level pick makes smart cleaning affordableQ10 S5+ | cost effective upgrade with essential powerQV 35A | value all-in-one robot vacuum with multifunctional dockQrevo S5V | best evolution of Qrevo seriesClean up and save with Roborock Prime Day discounts Beyond the convenience of avoiding manual chores in the heat of summer, Roborock is preparing to open a sale in early July. Roborock’s robot vacuums and mops offer advanced navigation, powerful suction, and smart features designed to adapt to your home. This Roborock Prime Day launch gives you the chance to elevate your cleaning routine with a significant upgrade. We’re breaking down four key models — the Q7 M5+, Q10 S5+, Qrevo S5V and the QV 35A — each engineered to simplify your life and leave your floors spotless. From essential vacuuming and basic mopping to fully automated, hands-free cleaning stations, there’s a Roborock perfect for every household’s needs and Prime Day budget. Q7 M5+ | entry-level pick makes smart cleaning affordable The Roborock Q7 M5+ (reg. $429) stands out as a formidable entry, particularly for its strong vacuuming capabilities. This model boasts an impressive 10,000 Pa HyperForce suction power, making it incredibly effective at lifting dirt, dust, and deeply embedded pet hair from both hard floors and carpets. It also features Roborock’s Dual Anti-Tangle System, which includes a unique JawScrapers Comb main brush, specifically designed to reduce hair tangles and minimize maintenance, a huge benefit for pet owners. Equipped with precise LiDAR navigation, the Q7 M5+ efficiently maps your home, ensuring thorough and systematic cleaning paths. The “Plus” in its name signifies the included auto-empty dock, which automatically empties the robot’s dustbin for weeks of hands-free dirt disposal. While its mopping is a more straightforward drag-style system with consistent water flow, it’s perfect for daily maintenance on hard surfaces, ensuring a comprehensive clean alongside its powerful vacuuming. Q10 S5+ | cost effective upgrade with essential power The Roborock Q10 S5+ (reg. $549.99) offers a significant upgrade in mopping performance while maintaining robust vacuuming. Like the Q7 M5+, it delivers a powerful 10,000 Pa HyperForce suction and features the Dual Anti-Tangle System for superior hair pickup. The key differentiator here is its advanced VibraRise 2.0 mopping system. This technology employs high-frequency sonic vibrations to scrub floors, mimicking manual effort to effectively tackle dried-on stains and grime. Crucially, the mop can automatically lift up to 8mm when carpet is detected, preventing wet messes on rugs and allowing for seamless transitions between vacuum-only and vacuum-and-mop modes. The Q10 S5+ also comes with an auto-empty dock, providing the same convenience of hands-free dust disposal as the Q7 M5+. Its combination of powerful vacuuming, advanced vibrating mopping with auto-lift, and self-emptying makes it a comprehensive solution for diverse homes. Both the Q7 M5+ and the Q10 S5+ offer impressive 10,000 Pa suction and the convenient auto-empty dock, making them fantastic choices for powerful, low-maintenance vacuuming. The Roborock Q7 M5+ is the ideal choice if your priority is maximum vacuuming power and effective pet hair management on all surfaces, with mopping serving as a good daily wipe-down for light grime. It’s a great all-rounder for homes dominated by mixed flooring or where vacuuming is the primary focus. However, if you have a significant amount of hard flooring that often experiences stubborn messes or simply desire a noticeably deeper, more active mopping performance, the Roborock Q10 S5+ is the better investment. Its VibraRise 2.0 system genuinely enhances the mopping, and the auto-lifting mop ensures your carpets stay dry, providing a superior two-in-one cleaning experience. FeaturesRoborock Q7 M5+Roborock Q10 S5+MoppingNoReactive TechObstacle AvoidanceLDS, PreciSense LiDAR NavigationLDS, PreciSense LiDAR NavigationNavigationLDS, PreciSense LiDAR NavigationLDS, PreciSense LiDAR NavigationSuction10,000Pa10,000PaBattery3200mAh5200mAhMain BrushRubber and bristle integrated brush with comb teeth for anti-tangle (single brush)Rubber and bristle integrated brush with comb teeth for anti-tangle (single brush)Side BrushAnti-Tangle side brush, the same as Vivian but non-extendable and non-liftableAnti-Tangle side brush, the same as Vivian but non-extendable and non-liftableDockThe same as TalcModels without “+” come with charging dock only. Models with “+” come with self-emptying dock.Multi-Floor Mapping34Carpet Ultra-Sonic SensoNoYesOthersSmall size 325mm diameterNormal size 350mm diameter QV 35A | value all-in-one robot vacuum with multifunctional dock The Roborock QV 35A (reg. $649.99) is a cutting-edge robot vacuum and mop that delivers fully automated cleaning. It boasts an impressive 8,000 Pa HyperForce suction power, allowing it to deep clean carpets and collect debris from hard floors. Like the Qrevo S5V, it features Dual Liftable Spinning Mops that provide active scrubbing for sparkling hard floors, and can lift automatically when on carpets. Get the QV 35A at Target now. The QV 35A shines with its all-in-one docking station. This multifunctional dock handles every aspect of maintenance from automatically emptying the dustbin, refilling the robot’s water tank, and washing and cold-air drying mop pads, ensuring they are always clean and ready for the next run. Integrated Reactive Tech obstacle avoidance ensures intelligent navigation around obstacles, while customizable carpet cleaning strategies offer tailored care. Its anti-tangle side brush gives it help with managing light messes in homes without a lot of pet hair. Qrevo S5V | best evolution of Qrevo series The Roborock Qrevo S5V (reg. $899.99) provides the latest in automated hands-free floor care and advanced mopping. Its signature feature is the dual spinning mop pads, which rotate at high speeds and apply consistent pressure to effectively scrub and remove even stubborn dried-on stains, delivering results that actually mimic hand-mopping. The all-in-one multifunctional dock is another highlight, taking care of virtually all maintenance. It does this by automatically emptying the robot’s dustbin, refilling its water tank, washing the mop pads during and after cleaning, and then hot-air drying them to prevent mildew and odors. Beyond superior mopping, the Qrevo S5V offers robust vacuuming capabilities with 12,000Pa HyperForce Suction and Roborock’s advanced Reactive Tech obstacle avoidance, enabling it to skillfully navigate around household clutter. It’s 100% hair removal rate powered by the dual anti-tangle system makes Qrevo S5V ideal for homes with pets. The highest-power 12,000Pa suction makes it ideal for larger homes with lots of foot traffic, and the FlexiArm Edge Mopping system makes it great for hard floors. Whether you prioritize powerful vacuuming, advanced vibrating or spinning mopping, or a fully automated, hands-free experience, there’s a Roborock model perfectly suited to your lifestyle. Don’t miss out on these limited-time Prime Day discounts, with potential savings of up to $800 off. Invest in smarter cleaning and enjoy a cooler, more relaxed summer with spotless floors managed effortlessly by Roborock. Keep up with the latest from Roborock on Facebook, Instagram, and X. html:
Summer is here, and the last thing anyone wants is to think about cleaning floors in the sweltering heat. Fortunately, Roborock robot vacuum and mop solutions are coming to the rescue with groundbreaking innovation and incredible value. Now is the perfect time to plan your next robot cleaner purchase, as the Roborock Prime Day launch is upon us, bringing discounts as significant as $800 off on these top-tier devices. Whether you’re battling pet hair, daily dust, or stubborn spills, Roborock’s latest lineup offers an intelligent, effortless cleaning solution for every home and budget. Let’s explore four standout models poised to make waves during this exclusive sales event.

Table of contents

  • Q7 M5+ | entry-level pick makes smart cleaning affordable
    • Q10 S5+ | cost effective upgrade with essential power
  • QV 35A | value all-in-one robot vacuum with multifunctional dock
  • Qrevo S5V | best evolution of Qrevo series
  • Clean up and save with Roborock Prime Day discounts

Beyond the convenience of avoiding manual chores in the heat of summer, Roborock is preparing to open a sale in early July. Roborock’s robot vacuums and mops offer advanced navigation, powerful suction, and smart features designed to adapt to your home.

This Roborock Prime Day launch gives you the chance to elevate your cleaning routine with a significant upgrade. We’re breaking down four key models — the Q7 M5+, Q10 S5+, Qrevo S5V and the QV 35A — each engineered to simplify your life and leave your floors spotless. From essential vacuuming and basic mopping to fully automated, hands-free cleaning stations, there’s a Roborock perfect for every household’s needs and Prime Day budget.

Q7 M5+ | entry-level pick makes smart cleaning affordable

The Roborock Q7 M5+ (reg. $429) stands out as a formidable entry, particularly for its strong vacuuming capabilities. This model boasts an impressive 10,000 Pa HyperForce suction power, making it incredibly effective at lifting dirt, dust, and deeply embedded pet hair from both hard floors and carpets. It also features Roborock’s Dual Anti-Tangle System, which includes a unique JawScrapers Comb main brush, specifically designed to reduce hair tangles and minimize maintenance, a huge benefit for pet owners.

Equipped with precise LiDAR navigation, the Q7 M5+ efficiently maps your home, ensuring thorough and systematic cleaning paths. The “Plus” in its name signifies the included auto-empty dock, which automatically empties the robot’s dustbin for weeks of hands-free dirt disposal. While its mopping is a more straightforward drag-style system with consistent water flow, it’s perfect for daily maintenance on hard surfaces, ensuring a comprehensive clean alongside its powerful vacuuming.

Q10 S5+ | cost effective upgrade with essential power

The Roborock Q10 S5+ (reg. $549.99) offers a significant upgrade in mopping performance while maintaining robust vacuuming. Like the Q7 M5+, it delivers a powerful 10,000 Pa HyperForce suction and features the Dual Anti-Tangle System for superior hair pickup.

The key differentiator here is its advanced VibraRise 2.0 mopping system. This technology employs high-frequency sonic vibrations to scrub floors, mimicking manual effort to effectively tackle dried-on stains and grime. Crucially, the mop can automatically lift up to 8mm when carpet is detected, preventing wet messes on rugs and allowing for seamless transitions between vacuum-only and vacuum-and-mop modes.

The Q10 S5+ also comes with an auto-empty dock, providing the same convenience of hands-free dust disposal as the Q7 M5+. Its combination of powerful vacuuming, advanced vibrating mopping with auto-lift, and self-emptying makes it a comprehensive solution for diverse homes.

Both the Q7 M5+ and the Q10 S5+ offer impressive 10,000 Pa suction and the convenient auto-empty dock, making them fantastic choices for powerful, low-maintenance vacuuming.

The Roborock Q7 M5+ is the ideal choice if your priority is maximum vacuuming power and effective pet hair management on all surfaces, with mopping serving as a good daily wipe-down for light grime. It’s a great all-rounder for homes dominated by mixed flooring or where vacuuming is the primary focus.

However, if you have a significant amount of hard flooring that often experiences stubborn messes or simply desire a noticeably deeper, more active mopping performance, the Roborock Q10 S5+ is the better investment. Its VibraRise 2.0 system genuinely enhances the mopping, and the auto-lifting mop ensures your carpets stay dry, providing a superior two-in-one cleaning experience.

QV 35A | value all-in-one robot vacuum with multifunctional dock

The Roborock QV 35A (reg. $649.99) is a cutting-edge robot vacuum and mop that delivers fully automated cleaning. It boasts an impressive 8,000 Pa HyperForce suction power, allowing it to deep clean carpets and collect debris from hard floors. Like the Qrevo S5V, it features Dual Liftable Spinning Mops that provide active scrubbing for sparkling hard floors, and can lift automatically when on carpets. Get the QV 35A at Target now.

The QV 35A shines with its all-in-one docking station. This multifunctional dock handles every aspect of maintenance from automatically emptying the dustbin, refilling the robot’s water tank, and washing and cold-air drying mop pads, ensuring they are always clean and ready for the next run. Integrated Reactive Tech obstacle avoidance ensures intelligent navigation around obstacles, while customizable carpet cleaning strategies offer tailored care. Its anti-tangle side brush gives it help with managing light messes in homes without a lot of pet hair.

Qrevo S5V | best evolution of Qrevo series

The Roborock Qrevo S5V (reg. $899.99) provides the latest in automated hands-free floor care and advanced mopping. Its signature feature is the dual spinning mop pads, which rotate at high speeds and apply consistent pressure to effectively scrub and remove even stubborn dried-on stains, delivering results that actually mimic hand-mopping. The all-in-one multifunctional dock is another highlight, taking care of virtually all maintenance. It does this by automatically emptying the robot’s dustbin, refilling its water tank, washing the mop pads during and after cleaning, and then hot-air drying them to prevent mildew and odors.

Beyond superior mopping, the Qrevo S5V offers robust vacuuming capabilities with 12,000Pa HyperForce Suction and Roborock’s advanced Reactive Tech obstacle avoidance, enabling it to skillfully navigate around household clutter. It’s 100% hair removal rate powered by the dual anti-tangle system makes Qrevo S5V ideal for homes with pets. The highest-power 12,000Pa suction makes it ideal for larger homes with lots of foot traffic, and the FlexiArm Edge Mopping system makes it great for hard floors.

Clean up and save with Roborock Prime Day discounts

This Prime Day, the opportunity to transform your home cleaning routine is here with incredible savings. Whether you prioritize powerful vacuuming, advanced vibrating or spinning mopping, or a fully automated, hands-free experience, there’s a Roborock model perfectly suited to your lifestyle. Don’t miss out on these limited-time Prime Day discounts, with potential savings of up to $800 off. Invest in smarter cleaning and enjoy a cooler, more relaxed summer with spotless floors managed effortlessly by Roborock.

Keep up with the latest from Roborock on Facebook, Instagram, and X.

Add 9to5Mac to your Google News feed.
